name: Noods!
description:
Noods! is a short game about getting out of the rain and into a bowl of noodles. It's made with Bitsy and as part of the Voiceworks Magazine digital writing jam.  It's the first game I'd ever made - a kind of a test run! It was super fun to make, and I hope you enjoy it!

Use arrow keys or WASD to move.

Thanks for taking the time to check it out!
